main.bio: I am Tewfik, I'm a future Full Stack ReactJS and ExpressJS Developer. Searching for a work I am open to any offer can make projects as freelancer ,work remotely and there will be gits for the first client  After a bad career choice which was to work in the industrial field far from IT  I decided in last August to to drop the factory and now I want to become a brillant web developer I studied the basis of Algorithmes and Data Structures in the university and I studied for almost 3 months Javascript and now it's been less then 10 days since I started REACT and EXPRESS ,God made me fall at the right time with your MERN lives and this challenge I learned a lot by making the whatsApp an Tiktok clone with sunny and david Thank you to all the team of clevers programmers and to all the comunity PEACE
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

testimonials.text: Stay away from people who try to diminish your ambitions, great people are the ones who make you feel that you can be one of them.

What seemed painful I found it comfortable, what seemed sad I found it happy, what seemed difficult I found it easy, and what seemed to be a failure, I found it a success, and what seemed dark, I found it bright and learned to not look at things from their appearances.
